settings.custom_liquid:
EXCHANGE & RETURN

Keeping up our promise of a hassle-free shopping experience, we make sure we offer easy returns. Should you not be happy with a purchase from us, donâ€™t sweat; we have got you covered. You can either return your purchase with another item, get a credit note, or opt for a refund.

EXCHANGE & RETURN

Refunds will only be processed after the item/s returned have been approved.

After approval, we will issue a refund after deducting the processing charges mentioned in the table below.

Criteria Charges
UNDER INR 10,000/- INR 750/-
ABOVE INR 10,000/- 5%
Booking amount/ advances 5%
Cancellation from our side No Charges

Excluding, where applicable, the original delivery charges and cash handling fees within 21 business days after approval.
*Please note Please note that the decision of accepting the return for a credit note or refund is the discretion of the company after assessment.

*Terms and Conditions*

  • The discretion of accepting a return against a credit note or refund is the discretion of the company.
  • Please note booking advances will be forfeited if there is no information from the buyer for over 2 weeks.
  • Returns/Exchange are not allowed for items viewed in person either through private viewing, open deliveries or any special request.
  • Returns/Exchange are not applicable on apparel and jewellery.
  • Please note that any returns/exchange request will not be honoured if the product is being sold under any sale or promotion.
  • International shipments cannot be returned. However, Confidential Couture can help list the product and resell it on a quick basis. You can also avail CC Infinity, a service of buy back by Confidential Couture. To know more about this service please click here.
  • Shipping charges are excluded in refund and credit note and are non-refundable.
  • All refunds are in a form of bank transfer only, irrespective of the mode of payment to us.
  • There is no return or exchange in new products or brand-new condition.
  • Please note that the returns will be done on the value of the final value of the product on the invoice excluding the shipping charges (COD or prepaid).
  • A return shipping fee of Rs.500 will be levied regardless of order cancellation or exchange/refund or you can choose to send it directly to us.

Return & Exchange Request for Click Now

settings.topd:
Keeping up our promise of a hassle-free shopping experience, we make sure we offer easy returns. Should you not be happy with a purchase from us, donâ€™t sweat; we have got you covered.

You can either return your purchase with another item, get a credit note, or opt for a refund.
settings.stitle1: HOW CAN YOU RETURN YOUR ITEM?
settings.desc1: Return request submitted through the provided form: Return & Exchange Request form Click Now. Our team is committed to ensuring your satisfaction.
settings.stitle2: WHEN CAN YOU RETURN AN ITEM?
settings.desc2:
The request must be made within 24 hours of the delivery of the product.
Any claim/request for replacement/return beyond the period of 24 hours shall not be accepted.
settings.desc3:
Item returned should be in the same condition as when received by the buyer, with all its belongings
including tags, authenticity seal, papers and packaging. Please note that returns will not be accepted
if the product is damaged or received without its original belongings and authenticity tag.

Once you request a return via a form, our operations team will be responsible for carrying out the
reverse pick up for your product at the earliest available slot.
Once the product is received by us in the office, it will be assessed for its condition, quality,
belongings, tags etc.
Once the assessment is complete, you will be informed about its status via email.

settings.topd:
You can exchange your item if you are not happy with your purchase with any other item. In case you do not wish to exchange an item immediately a CREDIT NOTE* will be issued.

The credit note is valid for 3 months from the date of issue.

The credit note is non transferable and cannot be encashed after date of expiration.

You can redeem the credit note multiple times and across the entire collection of the website. Credit notes can only be encashed on the items on the website and cannot be converted to cash at any time.

CC INFINITY is a service offered by Confidential Couture to ease the process even further. It allows you to resell your purchase/s back at CC for an extended period of 6 months. You can find out more about CC Infinity here.

Please Note: There is no return or exchange in new products or brand new condition.

Order Cancellation Policy

If a customer cancels their order after it has been placed, a 5% deduction will be applied.
Refunds will only be processed after the item/s returned have been approved. After approval, we will issue a refund after deducting the processing charges mentioned in the table below
settings.bottomd:
(excluding, where applicable, the original delivery charges and cash handling fees) within 21 business days after approval.

Please note that the decision of accepting the return for a credit note or refund is the discretion of the company after assessment.

settings.topd:
1. The discretion of accepting a return against a credit note or refund is the discretion of the company.

2. Please note booking advances will be forfeited if there is no information from the buyer for over 2 weeks.

3. Returns/Exchange are not allowed for items viewed in person either through private viewing, open deliveries or any special request.

4. Returns/Exchange are not applicable on apparel and jewellery.

5. Please note that the any returns/exchange request will not be honoured if the product is being sold under any sale or promotion.

6. International shipments cannot be returned. However, Confidential Couture can help list the product and resell it on a quick basis. You can also avail CC Infinity, a service of buy back by Confidential Couture. To know more about this service please click here.

7. Shipping charges are excluded in refund and credit note and are non-refundable.

8. All refunds are in a form of bank transfer only, irrespective of the mode of payment to us.

9. There is no return or exchange in new products or brand-new condition.

10. Please note that the returns will be done on the value of the final value of the product on the invoice excluding the shipping charges (COD or prepaid).

11. A return shipping fee of Rs.500 will be levied regardless of order cancellation or exchange/refund or you can choose to send it directly to us.

12. If product is sold under condition no return & exchange policy or product received under category
